title: Prompt Engineering for Developers
section: A Discipline at the Intersection of Art and Science
text:
A Discipline at the Intersection of Art and Science

The art and science of designing effective prompts for AI models
Crucial for getting the best results from language models
Bridges the gap between human intent and AI output



prompt engineering is a discipline that focuses on designing effective prompts for AI models. It bridges the gap between human intent and AI output, allowing us to get the best results from language models.
